Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

Interface PayloadConnection

All Superinterfaces:
PayloadSender
All Known Subinterfaces:
ConfigPayloadHandlingContext, PayloadHandlingContext, PlayPayloadHandlingContext
public interface PayloadConnection extends PayloadSender
Represents a connection capable of sending a payload to a receiver.
